Actions.Name: Create a Document
Actions.Description: Create a document with document type and related body parameters

Actions.Name: Delete a Document
Actions.Description: Delete a specific document with document type and document Id

Actions.Name: Get a document with Id and type
Actions.Description: Get a specific document via a document type and a document Id

Actions.Name: Get All Documents for a Document Type
Actions.Description: Get All Documents for a document type

Actions.Name: Send notification when an event occurs
Actions.Description: Create a subscription to get notification for a specific document and event (Create, Delete, Update)

Actions.Name: Update a Document
Actions.Description: Update a document with document type and document Id
